item.title: URL shortener and QR code Generator
item.author: cyrusncy@gmail.com (CyrusN)
item.description:
Installation

npm install -g goo.gl

Google API OAuth

for shortening a batch of links, create project for URL Shortener API. you will get 1,000,000 requests/day for FREE
